home.welcome: We match governmental and health organisations with hackers to fight the worldwide COVID-19 pandemic

organisations.title: Organisations
organisations.description: Can search for skills and availability amongst hackers and reach out to them to ask their help.

people.title: Hackers
people.description: Can help by adding a personal profile including skills and when available to join the fight.

future.title: Future
future.description: Connecting hackers affiliated to nation based health(tech) hackatons on a global scale.
